de.iabg.swing
Class StatusPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  de.iabg.swing.StatusPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class StatusPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Logger

This Logger creates a Swing component that displays a snapshot view of the last logged item. The display area for the log is replaced by calling the toString() method of the log source after every LogEvent is fired. The display area is formatted so that 16 Monospaced characters fit on each line without requiring a horizontal scrollbar.

Version:
September 10, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
See Also:
Serialized Form
